customer:
Ask the customer to record a video or picture and send it to us for analysis.
(Make sure to upload it into the system)
Check if the condenser fan blade is hitting any foreign objects.
technician:
Check if noise outside:
1.Check if the fan motor is defective.
2.Check whether there is any noise caused by loose screws.
3.Inspect the compressor for abnormal noise.

customer:
Ask the customer to record a video or picture and send it to us for analysis.
(Make sure to upload it into the system)

Is there any water accumulation inside the unit?
1. Ensure the drain hose is not bent.
2. Make sure the drain hose is positioned lower than the outlet to prevent water from accumulating inside the unit.
technician:
Please confirm whether the water Trough is cracked and leaking?
record a video or picture and send it to us for analysis.

asking the customer to record a picture and send it to us for analysis.
(Make sure to upload it into the system)
technician:
Is there water leakage at the bottom of the unit?
1. Check if the bottom drainage connecting pipe is not properly connected.
2. Remove the back panel and check if each connection pipe is properly connected.

customer:
asking the customer to record a picture and send it to us for analysis.
(Make sure to upload it into the system)

If it is clearly a transportation damage issue caused by the customer during handling
(we will only send parts to the customer, not dispatch a technician)

If it's a door issue, the customer can replace it themselves.

(Remember to send the leg along with the nuts when shipping the accessories!)

The customer complains that the ice Bin is not full?
The ice production output varies at different temperatures,This table assumes the base temperature of the water coming out of the tap at the installation location is 70°F.;The values in the table are in Pounds per 24-hour period;The numbers listed are an approximation to provide a starting point on determining the amount of ice the unit will produce under the circumstances at the location. Ice Production Specifications
technician:
Deep clean the probe assembly and guide the customer on how to clean it.
(If it is confirmed to be a cleaning issue, explain to the customer that this is not covered under the warranty) Ice Machine Probe Repositioning for Grounding Issues

Is there a lot of ice debris in the Trough?
Check if the defrost probe position is too high, causing early activation or continuous defrost mode. Readjust the positions of both probes.The correct adjustment position The correct position

customer:
asking the customer to record a picture and send it to us for analysis.
(Make sure to upload it into the system)

Confirm whether the equipment is dirty or clogged?
1.Ice machine cleaner is used to remove lime scale and mineral deposits. Ice machine sanitizer disinfects and removes algae and slime. For the cleaner and sanitizer, we recommend Atosa Ice Machine Cleaner and Sanitizer, but any Nickel Safe Ice Machine Cleaner should work​Cleaning and Sanitizing the Ice Machine
2.Ice Maker Cleaning Procedure​Cleaning Procedure
Confirm that the switch is in ice-making mode and not in cleaning mode?

Confirm whether the customer has installed a water filter?
1.Inline water filtration is required for all models of our ice machines.
2.If the pressure is to exceed 80psi then a regulator will need to be installed.
3.If the pressure is lower than 20 psi then a water pressurization system will need to be installed.
4.The inlet water temperature should be between 35°-90°FWater Filter

Confirm with the customer Is the water supply open?.
(Confirm if there is water in the trough?)
Confirm if the bottom filter has been cleaned. We recommend cleaning it once a month.Maintenance manual required

Confirm that the ambient temperature around the unit is not too high?
1.The ice machine should NEVER be installed outdoors,The ice machine should be installed in an air-conditioned space.
2.The ambient air temperature should be between 50°-110°F.
3.The ice machine should have at least 6 inches of clearance on all sides.
4.Nothing should be placed on the top of, or up against the side of the ice machine.​
technician:
Confirm whether the ice maker is functioning properly？
1.Power Plug Connection： The control board led is on.​Main power Led
2.Startup:Toggle the switch to the on position, the green led will flash; the hot gas valve opens for 10s, the compressor is energized​Startup
3.Ice Melt:The hot gas valve stays open for 20s, then the water pump runs to flush the evaporator for 20s, the hot gas valve and water pump stop, the drain valve opens for 15s then closes​Ice Melt
4.Prechill(40s):The compressor is on, and the condenser fan and water inlet valve are energized, hot gas valve and water pump are closed, thus to prechill the evaporator​Prechil
5.Freeze:Water pump,Compressor,Fan motor are energized to make ice Freeze

Does the equipment have power but not operate?
Ensure that the water curtain plate is in a normally closed state and that no ice blocks are obstructing it.Confirm that the water curtain switch indicator light is displaying yellow. If the switch is in the closed position but the yellow light is not on, the water curtain switch may be faulty and needs to be replacedD10-Water curtain LED

Check if the water pump is working？(ensure that there is enough water in the trough)
1. Check if the water pump indicator light on the control board is on and if there is voltage output. D2-water pump
2. If there is voltage output from the control board, measure whether the water pump has voltage input. If there is voltage but the pump is not working, replace the water pump.
3. If the water pump indicator light on the control board is off, check if the small fuse is blownCheck if the fuse is in good condition

Confirm whether the condenser fan is operating?
Check if the control board indicator light is on and if there is a voltage outputD5-Fan motor

Check if the compressor is working properly?
1.Check if the control board indicator light is on and if there is a voltage outputD6-compresser
2.Check if the big fuse is good.F1-compresser Fuse
3.Check if the compressor resistance is normal Compressor Resistance Check Video )
4.If the start component is faulty, it is recommended that the technician try using a 3n'1 start kit3n'1 Operating Instructions

All parts are functioning properly,Please check if there is a refrigerant leak?
Recommend the technician to test the low-side; the normal low pressure should be 30-40PSI,This creates a freeze plate temp of around 5°F-15°F.

customer: Confirm with the customer Is the water supply open?
technician:
Confirm whether the water inlet valve is functioning properly？

1. Confirm if the water trougn is full of water? If it is, the inlet valve is functioning properly.

2. Ensure that the water level probe is functioning properly. If the probe is damaged, it may also cause the inlet valve to stop working. Under normal conditions, When the probe comes into contact with water, it indicates that the water is full, the water level indicator light turns on, and the inlet valve stops working. D8-water probe.

3.If there is no water in the trough, it indicates that the inlet valve is not working. Check if the inlet valve indicator light on the control board is on, and measure whether there is voltage input to the inlet valve. If there is voltage but the valve is not operating, replace the inlet valveD1-Water Inlet Vavle.

Confirm whether the water outlet valve is functioning properly？

1.To check if the drain valve is functioning properly, put the machine into cleaning mode and observe whether the water in the internal tank is being drained. If the water is drained, the drain valve is working properly.

2.Measure whether the drain valve has a voltage input. If there is voltage but the valve does not work, replace the drain valve.D1-Water Inlet Vavle

3.During the ice harvest cycle, the dirty water must be completely drained from the unit. If it is not fully drained, adjustments need to be made.Adjust Drain V

The function of the NTC Probe？

The NTC Probe is a 10k ohm thermistor and is only used by the unit to see if there is enough stored heat in the refrigerant to efficiently perform a harvest cycle.If the probe tells the control board that there’s not enough heat to harvest, then the control board will turn the condenser fan off for a few mins before performing harvestNTC Probe.

(The only reason to test the NTC probe is if the unit is having issues harvesting the ice off the evaporator within the harvest cycle time limit)

customer:
The unit is completely non-functional?
(Check if the compressor and condenser fan are completely non-functional,Please replace the power outlet and try again to ensure there is power in the outlet.)

Please ask the customer to check if the power cord is damaged?
(If there is any damage, please take a photo and send it to us. We will send part and dispatch tech to repair it.)
technician:
If the unit has no power:
1.Check if the controller wiring harness is properly connected and ensure there are no loose connections.
2.Check if the Power Switch is faulty
